description: Marcos Estelito meets Matia Dellagiorna and something magical happens. As the men explore a new and inspired relationship, the spirit of Marcosâ€™ lost love, Martin Valdez, miraculously materializes. As if decreed by divine providence, the fallen lover returns and joins them. This blessed trinity suck and fuck each other into sexual oblivion with a love that is truly heaven sent.
title: Heaven Sent, Scene #04
